00002 ! ==============================================================
00003 !
00004 !
00005 !                  PEPC-E
00006 !
00007 !    Parallel Efficient Parallel Coulomb-solver: Electrostatics 
00008 !
00009 !   $ Revision $
00010 !
00011 !   Driver code for Coulomb-solver library lpepc
00012 !
00013 !  Major changes:
00014 !   June 2005: Development begun
00015 !
00016 !   See README.compile for summary of program units
00017 !
00018 !  ==============================================================
00019 
00020 program pepce
00021 
00022   use physvars
00023   use utils
00024   implicit none
00025   include 'mpif.h'
00026 
00027   ! timing stuff
00028   real :: t0, t_key, t_domain=0., t_build=0., t_branch=0., t_fill=0., t_props=0.
00029   real :: t_walk=0., t_walkc=0., t_en, t_force=0.
00030   real :: t_push, t_diag, t_start_push, t_prefetch=0., Tpon, ttot, t_laser
00031   integer :: tremain ! remaining wall_clock seconds
00032   integer :: ierr, lvisit_active, ifile, debug
00033 
00034   ! Initialize the MPI system
00035   call MPI_INIT(ierr)
00036 
00037   ! Get the id number of the current task
00038   call MPI_COMM_RANK(MPI_COMM_WORLD, my_rank, ierr)
00039 
00040   ! Get the number of MPI tasks
00041   call MPI_COMM_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, n_cpu, ierr)
00042 
00043   ! Time stamp
00044   if (my_rank==0) call stamp(6,1)
00045   if (my_rank==0) call stamp(15,1)
00046 
00047 
00048   call openfiles       ! Set up O/P files
00049 
00050   call setup           ! Each CPU gets copy of initial data
00051 
00052 !  debug=2
00053 
00054   call pepc_setup(my_rank,n_cpu,npart_total,theta,db_level,np_mult,fetch_mult)  ! Allocate array space for tree
00055 
00056   call param_dump      ! Dump initial data
00057   call configure       ! Set up particles
00058 
00059   do itime = 1,nt
00060      trun = trun + dt
00061 
00062 
00063      if (my_rank==0 ) then
00064         do ifile = 6,15,9
00065            write(ifile,'(//a,i8,(3x,a,f8.2))') &
00066                 ' Timestep ',itime+itime_start &
00067                 ,' total run time = ',trun 
00068 
00069         end do
00070 
00071      endif
00072      call cputime(t0)
00073      call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)  ! Wait for everyone to catch up
00074 
00075      call pepc_fields(npp,x(1:npp),y(1:npp),z(1:npp), &
00076 ! ux(1:npp),uy(1:npp),uz(1:npp), &   ! will eventually need velocities for B-fields -> 2nd interface
00077                  q(1:npp),m(1:npp),work(1:npp),pelabel(1:npp), &
00078                  ex(1:npp),ey(1:npp),ez(1:npp),pot(1:npp), &
00079                  mac, theta, eps, force_const, err_f, xl, yl, zl, itime, &
00080                  t_domain,t_build,t_prefetch,t_walk,t_walkc,t_force)   ! Compute Coulomb fields and pot using lpepc
00081 
00082 ! TODO: need proper mac selection instead of beam_config
00083 
00084      call error_test(npp)
00085      stop
00086      ! Integrator
00087      call cputime(t_start_push)
00088 
00089      call velocities(1,npp,dt)  ! pure ES, NVT ensembles
00090 
00091      call push_x(1,npp,dt)  ! update positions
00092 
00093 
00094      call cputime(t_push)
00095 
00096 
00097 
00098      call energy_cons(Ukine,Ukini)
00099 
00100      call cputime(t_diag)
00101 
00102 
00103 
00104      if (my_rank==0 .and. db_level .ge.1) then
00105         ttot = t_push-t0 ! total loop time without diags
00106 
00107         if (itime ==1 .or. mod(itime,iprot).eq.0) then
00108            ifile = 6
00109         else 
00110            ifile = 15
00111         endif
00112         write(ifile,'(//a/)') 'Timing:  Routine   time(s)  percentage'
00113         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Domains: ',t_domain,100*t_domain/ttot
00114         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Build: ',t_build,100*t_build/ttot
00115 
00116         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Prefetch: ',t_prefetch,100*t_prefetch/ttot
00117         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Walk serial: ',t_walk,100*t_walk/ttot
00118         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Walk comm: ',t_walkc,100*t_walkc/ttot
00119         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Forces: ',t_force,100*t_force/ttot
00120         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Pusher: ',t_push-t_start_push,100*(t_push-t_start_push)/ttot
00121         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Diagnostics: ',t_diag-t_push,100*(t_diag-t_push)/ttot
00122 
00123         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Total: ',ttot,100.
00124         write(ifile,'(a20,i4,6f12.3)') 'Timing format: ',n_cpu,t_domain,t_build,t_prefetch,t_walk+t_walkc,t_force,ttot
00125 
00126      endif
00127      call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)  ! Wait for everyone to catch up
00128 
00129   end do
00130 
00131 
00132   call closefiles      ! Tidy up O/P files
00133 
00134 
00135   ! Time stamp
00136   if (my_rank==0) call stamp(6,2)
00137   if (my_rank==0) call stamp(15,2)
00138   ! End the MPI run
00139   call MPI_FINALIZE(ierr)
00140 
00141 
00142 end program pepce
00143 
00144
